uvi.description:
drm/amd/pm: Update intermediate power state for SI

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.70 by commit 68d4fbe6220cd1f3d07cab0a4901e62f8c12cc68. For more details please see the references link.
